2164.subject: CST
2164.descrlong:
Students learn writing, presentation, research and critical-thinking skills within the diversified fields of information technology and communication design. Students learn how to analyze, predict, and articulate trends in the academic, public service, and private enterprise related to their majors. Students write two major papers, generate a preliminary capstone idea and give a combination oral/multimedia presentation before both a small and large audience. (Offered every semester.)  (Credit/ No Credit Available)

(Coreq: CST 300)
